Name: Villwars
About the game: Villars is a real-time strategy game. Control your troops and reach the very center of the enemy lands! On your side there will be a large detachment of soldiers ready to attack the enemy squad at the first order. Defend your lands, attack and think over the battle strategy depending on the terrain and position. Features: - Nice graphics. - Several different biomes. - Many variations of tactics development.
